title: American Graffiti Original Soundtrack - Remastered re-mix
description:
The soundtrack to the George Lucas film about teenage life in a small California town in the early &#039;60s was probably the best thing about the movie, featuring several dozen outstanding early rock & roll hits. There&#039;s nothing terribly obscure here ? in fact, most of these were big smashes ? but it&#039;s a good survey of rock&#039;s early days, ranging from superstars like Buddy Holly, Chuck Berry, Fats Domino, and the Beach Boys to great one-shots like the Monotones, the Tempos, and Buster Brown. Drawbacks: Wolfman Jack talks over the intros of a few songs, and there are a couple tracks by early-&#039;70s Sha Na Na-type revivalists Flash Cadillac. (amg)

Includes scans
